channel.title: Looking for Server Developers. Hosting ✓, Domain ✓, Unique ✓
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yLVCZ.png[/img][/center]
Hey guys,
I started a new project called "Phuriate", And for the record this is not an advertisement thread. I made this topic to search for some developers that might be interested in helping. I can't do this on my own, because I only really have experience the in web-based aspects of the project. We are basically using a close-to-blank PI (317), and I have a lot of ideas that would make great features, I am just not experienced enough to add them myself.
[b][size=10pt]Contact:[/size][/b] Msn: chrisrox6@hotmail.com Skype: rick.wellis
[u][b][size=14pt]Current Team[/size][/b][/u]
[b][size=10pt]Server Development/Client Development[/size][/b] 1. Joeri 2. OPEN 3. OPEN
All we really need are some Server/Client developers, the web-based coding is all handled. We have a full website, with a forum, and a working highscore/vote4cash system. All we are simply looking for are developers who know what they are doing when they handle the server/client files. Some positive criticism is appreciated, not looking forward to flamers. [i]If you are a server/client developer looking for work, you know how to contact me.[/i]
Btw, I feel like I don't need to post pics. Everyone/Almost everyone already knows what a blank PI is like.

item.title: Looking for Server Developers. Hosting ✓, Domain ✓, Unique ✓
item.dc:creator: @username213 username213
item.description:
@username213 wrote:

Hey,

I’m applying for not a developer rank but for this rank
Co-owner And Staff Manager

I know it sounds stupid applying for this rank but im so experienced it is un-true (no joke) 2.5-3 years of experience and dedication to RSPS playing near enough every single day. I play RSPS for 6-11 hours a day and have done for a long time and love it.

I hope i can come and help you to manage your server and prove to be a great staff member and make the server the best it can be and manage the staff team in such a way they are one of the best around.

I look forward to your reply…
P.S Skype Name = rs.ps.1

Read full topic
